original: Kindberg, Karl Arvid Heribert, läroverksadjunkt, Halm,Stad, f. 7/9/79 i Visby av ’S«jökapt. Matias K. o. Hanna Nyström. G. 11 m. Anna Pettersson. Halmstads h. a. 1. fr. 10, yrkessk :lär. i Halmsitad: fr. 20. Förstie kurator i Gotl. nat. i Upps. 02-04, förest, f. stud:fören. Verdandis folkbibi. verk-samh. 04-05, v. ordf. i Verdandi 05, led. av stud :kårens direkt. 02-04, suppl. i direkt. 04-05, led. av (stadsfulim. i Halmstad 17-19 o. 23-27, ,suppl. i drät-selkamm. 19-21 o. i stadsfullm. be- redn :utsk. 23-27, landstingsman 26, led. av avlön:ndn 21-22, folksk:styr. 21-24, ordf. där 21-22, led. av bibl:styr. fr. 21, Y. ordf. fr. 41, bibi. v. Halmstads h. a. 1. bibi. o. v. Tol-lska bibi. 21-22, stadsbibi. 21-31, omb. f. skolöverstyr. v. reakx. i Falkenberg 26-28, ordf. i RPO i Halmstad fr. 33, ordf. i IS Hal-mia fr. 38, insp. f. Halmistads föreläs-n :fören. sed. 32, ordf. i Halmstads lokalavd. av Sv:es fris. ungd:förb. 22, ordf. i Adj:fören., ordf. i Fris. fören. 17-23, ordf. i Hall. fris. valkretsförb. 21-23, ordf. i Halmstads lib. fören. 23-30, v. ordf. i bridgekl. Laxtrappan 3*7, ordf. (ålderman) 38, ordf. i VB-kl. (bridgekl.) 38-44, v. ordf. sed. 44. Ordf. i W-Sex 23-29, v. ordf. 29-32, ordf. 30-36, kan^siler 315-44. translated: Kindberg, Karl Arvid Heribert, high school teacher, Halmstad, City, b. 7/9/79 in Visby to 'S«seacapt. Matias K. and Hanna Nyström. M. 11 with Anna Pettersson. Children: Kurt b. 12. - Studied at Visby 98, Bachelor of Arts in Uppsala 01. Acting teacher in Vadstena 05-06, assistant teacher in Norrköping 06-07, substitute lecturer and assistant teacher in Västerås 08-10, teacher of history, geography, and mathematics at Halmstad High School from 10, vocational school teacher in Halmstad from 20. First curator of Gotland Natural Society in Uppsala 02-04, manager of the study association 'Verdandis' People's Library Work 04-05, deputy chairman of Verdandi 05, member of the student body board 02-04, substitute in the board 04-05, member of the city council in Halmstad 17-19 and 23-27, substitute in the municipal executive committee 19-21 and in the city council's preparatory committee 23-27, member of the county council 26, member of the remuneration committee 21-22, primary school board 21-24, chairman there 21-22, member of the library board from 21, vice chairman from 41, librarian at Halmstad High School Library and Toll's Library 21-22, city librarian 21-31, representative for school superintendency at Falkenberg secondary school 26-28, chairman of the RPO in Halmstad from 33, chairman of the IS Hal-mia from 38, inspector for the Halmstad lecture association since 32, chairman of the Halmstad local branch of the Swedish Youth Temperance Association 22, chairman of the Teachers' Association, chairman of the Temperance Association 17-23, chairman of the Halland Temperance Electoral District Association 21-23, chairman of the Halmstad Liberal Association 23-30, vice chairman of the bridge club Laxtrappan 37, chairman (alderman) 38, chairman of the VB-club (bridge club) 38-44, vice chairman since 44. Chairman of W-Sex 23-29, vice chairman 29-32, chairman 30-36, counselor 315-44. Writings: Gotland (00), History of Halmstad-Blomman's Railway (26), Sweden's Regents (38), Halmstad through the ages (in Swedish city monographs 46), Halmstad Trade Association 1847-1947 (47), I S. Halmia 40 years (47), newspaper articles and reviews RVO.

employmentHistory.name: Teacher of History, Geography, and Mathematics
